actions.name: AcceptReservedNodeExchange
actions.description: Grants permission to exchange a DC1 reserved node for a DC2 reserved node with no changes to the configuration

actions.name: AddPartner
actions.description: Grants permission to add a partner integration to a cluster

actions.name: AssociateDataShareConsumer
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a consumer to a datashare

actions.name: AuthorizeClusterSecurityGroupIngress
actions.description: Grants permission to add an inbound (ingress) rule to an Amazon Redshift security group

actions.name: AuthorizeDataShare
actions.description: Grants permission to authorize the specified datashare consumer to consume a datashare

actions.name: AuthorizeEndpointAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to authorize endpoint related activities for redshift-managed vpc endpoint

actions.name: AuthorizeSnapshotAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to the specified AWS account to restore a snapshot

actions.name: BatchDeleteClusterSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to delete snapshots in a batch of size upto 100

actions.name: BatchModifyClusterSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to modify settings for a list of snapshots

actions.name: CancelQuery
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a query through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.name: CancelQuerySession
actions.description: Grants permission to see queries in the Amazon Redshift console

actions.name: CancelResize
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a resize operation

actions.name: CopyClusterSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to copy a cluster snapshot

actions.name: CreateAuthenticationProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift authentication profile

actions.name: CreateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to create a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift parameter group

actions.name: CreateClusterSecurityGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift security group

actions.name: CreateClusterSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a manual snapshot of the specified cluster

actions.name: CreateClusterSubnetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift subnet group

actions.name: CreateClusterUser
actions.description: Grants permission to automatically create the specified Amazon Redshift user if it does not exist

actions.name: CreateCustomDomainAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to create a custom domain name for a cluster

actions.name: CreateEndpointAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to create a redshift-managed vpc endpoint

actions.name: CreateEventSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift event notification subscription

actions.name: CreateHsmClientCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to create an HSM client certificate that a cluster uses to connect to an HSM

actions.name: CreateHsmConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create an HSM configuration that contains information required by a cluster to store and use database encryption keys in a hardware security module (HSM)

actions.name: CreateQev2IdcApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create a qev2 idc application

actions.name: CreateRedshiftIdcApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create a redshift idc application

actions.name: CreateSavedQuery
actions.description: Grants permission to create saved SQL queries through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.name: CreateScheduledAction
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Redshift scheduled action

actions.name: CreateSnapshotCopyGrant
actions.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot copy grant and encrypt copied snapshots in a destination AWS Region

actions.name: CreateSnapshotSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot schedule

actions.name: CreateTags
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a specified resource

actions.name: CreateUsageLimit
actions.description: Grants permission to create a usage limit

actions.name: DeauthorizeDataShare
actions.description: Grants permission to remove permission from the specified datashare consumer to consume a datashare

actions.name: DeleteAuthenticationProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift authentication profile

actions.description: Grants permission to delete a cluster subnet group

actions.description: Grants permission to delete a redshift-managed vpc endpoint

actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift event notification subscription

actions.name: DeleteHsmClientCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an HSM client certificate

actions.name: DeleteHsmConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift HSM configuration

actions.description: Grants permission to delete a partner integration from a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to delete a qev2 idc application

actions.description: Grants permission to delete a redshift idc application

actions.description: Grants permission to delete the resource policy for a specified resource

actions.description: Grants permission to delete saved SQL queries through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Redshift scheduled action

actions.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot copy grant

actions.description: Grants permission to delete a usage limit

actions.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to describe attributes attached to the specified AWS account

actions.description: Grants permission to describe created Amazon Redshift authentication profiles

actions.description: Grants permission to describe database revisions for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to describe parameters contained within an Amazon Redshift parameter group

actions.name: DescribeClusterSecurityGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon Redshift security groups

actions.description: Grants permission to describe one or more snapshot objects, which contain metadata about your cluster snapshots

actions.description: Grants permission to describe one or more cluster subnet group objects, which contain metadata about your cluster subnet groups

actions.name: DescribeClusterTracks
actions.description: Grants permission to describe available maintenance tracks

actions.name: DescribeClusterVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe available Amazon Redshift cluster versions

actions.description: Grants permission to describe properties of provisioned clusters

actions.name: DescribeCustomDomainAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to describe custom domain names for a cluster

actions.name: DescribeDataShares
actions.description: Grants permission to describe datashares created and consumed by your clusters

actions.description: Grants permission to describe only datashares consumed by your clusters

actions.description: Grants permission to describe only datashares created by your clusters

actions.name: DescribeDefaultClusterParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to describe parameter settings for a parameter group family

actions.description: Grants permission to describe redshift-managed vpc endpoints

actions.description: Grants permission to authorize describe activity for redshift-managed vpc endpoint

actions.name: DescribeEventCategories
actions.description: Grants permission to describe event categories for all event source types, or for a specified source type

actions.name: DescribeEventSubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon Redshift event notification subscriptions for the specified AWS account

actions.name: DescribeHsmClientCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to describe HSM client certificates

actions.name: DescribeHsmConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon Redshift HSM configurations

actions.name: DescribeInboundIntegrations
actions.description: Grants permission to list the inbound integrations

actions.description: Grants permission to describe whether information, such as queries and connection attempts, is being logged for a cluster

actions.name: DescribeNodeConfigurationOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe properties of possible node configurations such as node type, number of nodes, and disk usage for the specified action type

actions.name: DescribeOrderableClusterOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe orderable cluster options

actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the partner integrations defined for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to describe qev2 idc applications

actions.description: Grants permission to describe redshift idc applications

actions.description: Grants permission to describe exchange status details and associated metadata for a reserved-node exchange. Statuses include such values as in progress and requested

actions.description: Grants permission to describe available reserved node offerings by Amazon Redshift

actions.name: DescribeReservedNodes
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the reserved nodes

actions.description: Grants permission to describe the last resize operation for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to describe saved queries through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.name: DescribeScheduledActions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe created Amazon Redshift scheduled actions

actions.description: Grants permission to describe snapshot copy grants owned by the specified AWS account in the destination AWS Region

actions.name: DescribeSnapshotSchedules
actions.description: Grants permission to describe snapshot schedules

actions.description: Grants permission to describe account level backups storage size and provisional storage

actions.name: DescribeTable
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a table through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.name: DescribeTableRestoreStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to describe status of one or more table restore requests made using the RestoreTableFromClusterSnapshot API action

actions.name: DescribeTags
actions.description: Grants permission to describe tags

actions.name: DescribeUsageLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to describe usage limits

actions.description: Grants permission to disable logging information, such as queries and connection attempts, for a cluster

actions.name: DisableSnapshotCopy
actions.description: Grants permission to disable the automatic copy of snapshots for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a consumer from a datashare

actions.description: Grants permission to enable logging information, such as queries and connection attempts, for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to enable the automatic copy of snapshots for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to execute a query through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.description: Grants permission to failover the primary compute of an Multi-AZ cluster to another AZ

actions.name: FetchResults
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch query results through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.description: Grants permission to get temporary credentials to access an Amazon Redshift database by the specified AWS account

actions.description: Grants permission to get the configuration options for the reserved-node exchange

actions.description: Grants permission to get an array of DC2 ReservedNodeOfferings that matches the payment type, term, and usage price of the given DC1 reserved node

actions.description: Grants permission to get the resource policy for a specified resource

actions.description: Grants permission to join the specified Amazon Redshift group

actions.description: Grants permission to list databases through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.description: Grants permission to list Advisor recommendations

actions.description: Grants permission to list saved queries through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.description: Grants permission to list schemas through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the AQUA configuration of a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing Amazon Redshift authentication profile

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the settings of a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the database revision of a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the list of AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles that can be used by a cluster to access other AWS services

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the maintenance settings of a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a parameter group

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the settings of a snapshot

actions.description: Grants permission to modify a snapshot schedule for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to modify a cluster subnet group to include the specified list of VPC subnets

actions.description: Grants permission to modify a custom domain name for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to modify a redshift-managed vpc endpoint

actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing Amazon Redshift event notification subscription

actions.name: ModifyQev2IdcApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to modify a qev2 idc application

actions.name: ModifyRedshiftIdcApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to modify a redshift idc application

actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing saved query through the Amazon Redshift console

actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing Amazon Redshift scheduled action

actions.description: Grants permission to modify the number of days to retain snapshots in the destination AWS Region after they are copied from the source AWS Region

actions.description: Grants permission to modify a snapshot schedule

actions.description: Grants permission to modify a usage limit

actions.description: Grants permission to pause a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to purchase a reserved node

actions.description: Grants permission to update the resource policy for a specified resource

actions.description: Grants permission to reboot a cluster

actions.name: RejectDataShare
actions.description: Grants permission to decline a datashare shared from another account

actions.name: ResetClusterParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to set one or more parameters of a parameter group to their default values and set the source values of the parameters to "engine-default"

actions.description: Grants permission to change the size of a cluster

actions.name: RestoreFromClusterSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a cluster from a snapshot

actions.description: Grants permission to create a table from a table in an Amazon Redshift cluster snapshot

actions.description: Grants permission to resume a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to revoke an ingress rule in an Amazon Redshift security group for a previously authorized IP range or Amazon EC2 security group

actions.description: Grants permission to revoke access for endpoint related activities for redshift-managed vpc endpoint

actions.description: Grants permission to rotate an encryption key for a cluster

actions.description: Grants permission to update the status of a partner integration

actions.description: Grants permission to view query results through the Amazon Redshift console
